channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP SE -- SAP SQL Anywhere Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP SE -- SAP SQL Anywhere Server

item.title: CVE-2022-27670|2024-08-03T05:32:59.825Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20sql%20anywhere%20server
item.description: SAP SQL Anywhere - version 17.0, allows an authenticated attacker to prevent legitimate users from accessing a SQL Anywhere database server by crashing the server with some queries that use indirect identifiers.
